short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Miva ExamWatch Auto-Proctoring Tool ensures online exam integrity at Miva Open University through automated proctoring.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Miva ExamWatch Auto-Proctoring Tool is designed to uphold the integrity of online exams at Miva Open University by automating the proctoring process.
This tool is currently exclusive to Miva Open University students.
